results.text: ከእነርሱ በፊትም የቀድሞዎቹ (ሕዝቦች) አብዛኞቻቸው በእርግጥ ተሳስተዋል፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ምርጥ የሆኑት የአላህ ባሮች ብቻ ሲቀሩ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ኑሕም በእርግጥ ጠራን፡፡ ጥሪውን ተቀባዮቹም ምንኛ አማርን!
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
